Package com.ooad.hw1.engine

Interface JumpBehavior

All Known Implementing Classes:
LongJump, ShortJump
public interface JumpBehavior
JumpBehavior is an interface, and it is simple example of Strategy Design Pattern. It will enable to change object's jumpBehavior at runtime.
